text: Handling continuous descriptive features » Turn them into boolean features based on a threshold » To find the threshold: 1. Sort according to feature values 2. Adjacent instances that have different classifications are potential thresholds 3. Compute IG for each potential threshold 4. Select one with the highest IG as the actual threshold * New dynamically created boolean feature competes with other features for selection as the splitting feature for a node * Repeat as needed as the tree is built. %\
